modName: Chero's Belts - CBBE - BodySlide - UNPB and UNP shaped
summary: This mod makes 18 belts + 1 strap from ChronoTrigger77s Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT standalone and provide a few with carry weight bonuses, which match with Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
descriptionHtml:
[b]

[size=4]Description[/size][size=4]:[/size][/b][size=4]
[/size]
This mod is not the first I created but it will be the first I share. I made dozens of mods and translations the last years, mainly for personal use, but now I will upload them one by one.

I created this mod outta necessity. I like to mix different parts of different armors and I ever need a matching central piece. Chrono's work, which I really enjoy, closed this gap but I always had to zap a whole armor for it and many enemies were completely nude. This circumstance was really dissatisfying in order that was a new idea born. I made the different belts from Chrono's mod standalone and I also edited his bodyslide files to fit with the new folder structure.
Because I really like Dragten's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches[/url] mod, I gave all belts with bags matching bonuses.
The belts use bodyslot 47 and the strap bodyslot 46 and are craftable on the tanning rack. All the belts are only for female characters! You will need a CBBE compatible body to use them.

English isn't my first language and I haven't use a machine translation. I tried my best to write in a proper English but if you find grammar mistakes, feel free to contact me for a better description.

If you like the mod, I would be glad if you endorse it. But please don't forget to go to Chrono's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT[/url] and also endorse his mod - if you have it not yet.

[b]
[size=4]This mod includes in all 19 pieces:[/size][/b]

[list]
[*][size=2]Ebony and Ebonymail Belt [/size]
[*][size=2]Elven Belt [/size]
[*][size=2]Forsworn Belt [/size]
[*][size=2]Fur Belt [/size]
[*][size=2]Hentai Belt [/size]
[*][size=2]ImperialLight and Heavy Belt [/size]
[*][size=2]Thieves Guild Belts in different variations with and without bags[/size]
[*][size=2]Dawnguard Belt and Strap[/size]
[*][size=2]Bonemold Belt[/size]
[*][size=2]Bodyslide files[/size]
[/list]

[b][size=4]Requirement:[/size][/b]
[size=2]
[/size][list]
[*][size=2]Dawnguard[/size]
[*][size=2]Dragonborn[/size]
[*][size=2]a CBBE compatible body (UNPB and UNP shaped files under download section)[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=2][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url][/size][/size]
[/list][size=2][size=2]
[/size][/size][list]
[*][size=2]you can also try my personal [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66579/?]Body[/url]    [/size]
[/list][size=4][b]

Installation:[/b]
[/size]
[u]Manual[/u] - Simply download the file and extract everything into your Data folder.

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Download the file to NMM and install it like you would any other mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Download the file to MO and install it like you would any other mod. Or download the archive manually and open the zip via MO and install.


[size=4][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]

[u]Manual[/u] - Simple remove the CheroBelts.esp and the meshes/clothes/belts folder. For the Bodyslide files delete in

CalienteTools\BodySlide\ShapeData

==> CheroEbonyBelt
==> CheroElvenBelt
==> CheroForswornBelt
==> CheroFurBelt
==> CheroHentaiBelt
==> CheroImperialBelt
==> CheroThievesBelt
==> CheroDawnguardBelt
==> CheroBonemoldBelt

      and in CalienteTools\BodySlide\SliderSets

==> CheroBelts

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.


[size=4][b]Loadorder:[/b][/size]

Doesn't matter or use BOSS/LOOT if you want.


[size=4][b]Version:[/b][/size]

1.0 Initial release
1.1 Reupload with correct bodyslot 55 files in it. No need to update, if you have use bodyslide.
1.2 All belts are now craftable on tanning rack - no split between forge and tanning rack anymore.
      Ebonymailbelt can now be found under ebony section instead of clothing.
1.3 Added Dawnguard Belt and Strap. Required Dawnguard from now on!
1.4 Added Bonemold Belt. Required Dawnguard and Dragonborn from now on!
      Under miscellaneous you can now find UNPB and UNP shaped files.
1.5 The elven belt is finally fixed. Changed the bodyslots for belts to 47 and for the strap to 46.
1.6 Just a few nif-edits for the ground models. All "MagicDisallowEnchanting" keywords are removed now.


[size=4][b]Known Issues:[/b][/size]

The Hentai belt uses custom textures which are not included in my mod. If you don't use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT[/url] please download the mod and extract the following two files and place them into your data folder or if you use MO into ModOrganizer\mods\CherosBelts.

You'll need textures\armor\mak\belt\belt.dds and textures\armor\mak\belt\belt_n.dds.

Keep the same folder structure!

Contact me via PM, if you find other issues.[size=4][b]

[/b][b]
Credits:[/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2442809/?tb=mods&pUp=1]ChronoTrigger77[/url] - all credits go to him and his work with the models, bodyslide files and many thanks for permission to use them
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Caliente[/url] and Ousnius - for CBBE and Bodyslide
ElminsterAU - for TES5Edit
Bethesda - for Skyrim and the possibility to give it our own touch


[size=4][b]Permission:[/b][/size]

I use ChronoTrigger77's files for my mod and he made his mod NEXUS exclusive and I respect his move. So this mod will be also NEXUS exclusive and mustn't be uploaded on other sites.
If you have any questions feel free to contact me.

[size=4][b]
My other mods:[/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66579/?]Chero's YazBody - BBP - TBBP - HDT[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70669?]Chero's High Quality INIs
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84015/?]Chero's Sculptures[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84492/?]Chero's Vampire Lord[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1253/?]Chero's YazBody - BBP - TBBP - HDT (SpecialEdition)[/url]
